name: matrixone (matrixorigin)
description: [项目级] MySQL-compatible HTAP database with Git for Data, vector search, and fulltext search. Cloud-native, AI-ready。来源: https://github.com/matrixorigin/matrixone

genes.title: 项目概述
genes.content:
MySQL-compatible HTAP database with Git for Data, vector search, and fulltext search. Cloud-native, AI-ready

来源: https://github.com/matrixorigin/matrixone
语言: Go
Stars: 1885

genes.title: 安装与快速开始
genes.content:
| Tutorial | Language/Framework | Description |
|----------|-------------------|-------------|

| [PyMySQL CRUD Demo](https://docs.matrixorigin.cn/en/v25.3.0.2/MatrixOne/Tutorial/develop-python-crud-demo/) | Python | Basic database operations with Python |

genes.content:
